name: Proxy Light
description:
AVAILABLE PLATFORMS:

Windows/Linux

"Proxy Light is a puzzle game about turning on all of the lights.

'Tis but a simple concept, but things can get complicated real quickly...

With a combo of clicks, slides, and quick clicks, can you turn on all of the lights?"

This was a side project from the end of 2020 that I was using to keep myself sane at a desk job.  It is still available on the Google Play store if you search for it, but I figured I would immortalize this torturous game on Itch.io and start up a portfolio of completed games.

I'm not gonna lie, it's not easy... but the good news is that it's not necessarily addicting unless you're trying to compete with friends on how you can hack the Par system to get the best score.

Godspeed, and I look forward to being ripped apart in the comments.  Thanks for playing!

https://games.vintedgestudio.com
